name: Wevorce, Inc.
description: Provider of divorce handling services intended to help couples and families get through their divorce. The company's services include assisting couples through the six broad steps of divorce planning, co-parent planning, financial agreements and divorce settlement, enabling clients to have access to lawyers, counselors and financial professionals when they need it throughout the divorce process.
